title: Siren

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player's house to send the song to.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Visitors of the house with the song will be redirected to you. They will not be notified they were redirected.
- Good killing players who visit the house with the song will be disarmed by the melody and not attack you if they're redirected. They are not aware they were disarmed.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to see the town lose.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4549
*In the dead of night, the only noise beyond the hushed movement of mice was the quiet, frail song of a girl. Her voice was like a fishing line thrown so weakly the wind caught it, dispersing the melody of the song to whomever it wished. The tune was simple and sorrowful. Neither man nor woman could hear the song without wandering astray, trying to find who the voice belonged to.*
